summary: [I'm brazillian and my english is very awful. Sorry for my english] Aziiul is a nordic female paladin on level 85. Needs Dragonborn DLC, Heartfire and Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][i][b]Alduin, Miraak and Harkon are dead, the thieves guild is not complete, the civil war is complete, (stormcloaks won) quests of companions is finished, all of the Dark Brotherhood quests are complete.Some daedric quests have not yet been completed. Aziiul was married, but she killed her husband. And has two daughters (Lucy and Runa). The college quest glitched, then is not finished. She is a paladin level 85. Forgiveness by graphics, my PC sucks. (E se o Carlos Chagas estiver vendo isso, obrigada, mestre.)[/b][/i][/size]

[font=Courier New]   [/font][size=6][b][i][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00]I recommend you install the mods below[/color][/font][/i][/b][/size][size=6]
[/size]

[size=5] You need the latest version of [i][b][font=Verdana][color=#000000][u]SKSE and SkyUI[/u].[/color][/font][/b][/i][/size]
  
[b][i][u][size=3]
(have troubleshooting on skse instalation? use the installer! [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url])[/size][/u][/i][/b]
[size=3][b][i][u]
[/u][/i][/b][/size][b][i][u][size=3](SkyUI: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?[/url])[/size][/u][/i][/b]
[b][i]
[/i][/b][b][i] 
[color=#ff7700][size=6]Recommended mods: [/size][/color][/i][/b]
[b][i]
[/i][/b][b][i]-Racemenu: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]Http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/[/url][/i][/b]
[b][i]-Freckles For Females: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/690/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/690/?[/url][/i][/b]
[b][i]-Frostfall: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/?]Http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/?[/url][/i][/b]
[b][i]-Cloaks Of Skyrim: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/[/url][/i][/b]
[b][i]-A Matter of Time: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44091/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44091/?[/url][/i][/b]
[b][i]-Wet And Cold: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?[/url][/i][/b]
[b][i]-Wet And Cold Ashes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31968/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31968/?[/url][/i][/b]
[b][i]-Wet And Cold Holidays:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51472/?] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51472/?[/url][/i][/b]

[i][b][size=4]
You need [color=#000000]Dragonborn DLC, Heartfire and Dawnguard[/color].[/size][/b][/i]
[size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][i][b][size=4]
I am Brazilian, and my English is bad. So, forgive me.[/size][/b][/i]
